Description: Fragment of neck of Clazomenian black-figure painted pottery neck-amphora. Siren facing left. Purple for fillet and inner part of wing. White for flesh, stripe along wing, dots at base of feathers.
Producer name: Attributed to an Apprentice/Pupil of: The Petrie Painter
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 588, 11)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 135)
